lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: In my experience, there are a great deal of problems with traditional charity. External 'solutions' rarely are sustainable. Whereas Kiva gives them tools to improve their own lives as they see fit.
lender.occupational_info: I listen to everyday people on behalf of companies. I also help make sense of their customers' needs. They then go away and, hopefully, improve their stuff to make customers happy.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: By caring for one another, the world's people become closer and the artificial walls we erect crumble. I have much, and so many others have so little; it is my way of paying it forward for a blessed life.

lender.name: Mikaela
lender.loan_because: I know that small acts can make a big difference. Giving someone that jump start they need can work miracles and foster an entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I help people that have been hurt by other people.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can and it feels good. Thanks Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a citizen of the developed world, a world which is wasteful, myopic, and greedy, who is trying to change that a little bit at a time.

lender.name: Angelo
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I am studying photography at a college in Virginia Beach, VA.

lender.name: Ethan
lender.loan_because: My grandma gave me a gift certificate

lender.name: Kimihiko
lender.loan_because: I want to help children go to school.

lender.name: Cecil
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Kentucky I am studying Sustainable Agriculture, Community Development and leadership and Minoring in Agriculture Economics and Animal Science.

lender.name: Georgia
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people help themselves to fulfilling lives. We all need a little help now and then.
lender.occupational_info: I raise funds from corporations and foundations in support of educational research and scholarships, as well as other projects for faculty and students at the university.

lender.name: LifeCoach Aps
lender.loan_because: We believe that we, as world citizens, all have a joint responsibility for improving each others physical and spiritual living conditions. We really like the idea of having a direct insight in what our donations are spent on and that we can support the projects that in our opinion has the largest impact and the greatest chance of succeeding in terms of improving living conditions for the recipients and their families in generations to come.

lender.name: Clem
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get the best deal on the things they need.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Deut. 15:7-8, seems to sum it up. We have been very blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I design electronic and computer systems, and provide consulting services to companies and organizations that do not have expertise on their staff.

lender.name: Koinonia at FPC
lender.loan_because: Jesus told us to love our neighbors
lender.occupational_info: We're members of a Christian church

lender.name: Jim & Diane
lender.loan_because: We want to help people better themselves.

lender.name: Nate & Jen
lender.loan_because: I want to support small business
lender.occupational_info: We make high-quality, natural soap. Our unrefined shea butter comes from Ghana so we especially like to support their local economies.

lender.name: Jollean
lender.loan_because: I want to eventually have my own business too and I know I'll need lots of help when I start it. I think the best way to help myself is to help others because the universe wants us to look after one another, no matter where we come from! :)
lender.occupational_info: I just moved to a new city in Canada and am looking for new work. Hopefully it will be creative and inspiring. I am also writing a movie script with my friend. :)

lender.name: Birgit
lender.loan_because: I was able to start my business with a the help of government program and it has allowed me to make significant changes in my life. I believe that through nurturing and with the proper resources to guide us, we are all able to overcome hardship and thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I cook healthy food for people who don't have the time or the energy to do so for themselves.

lender.name: Gail and Andy
lender.loan_because: We all need to help each other when we can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a creative person who plays the guitar, writes and sings folk songs, makes beadwork, and writes stories. Andy is an elected politician with a passion for helping people and changing the world for the better.

lender.name: Christian City Church
lender.loan_because: KIVA actions what we hold as part of our vision that a church can make a real difference in helping people build great futures.
lender.occupational_info: Community oriented church that is guided by the biblical principle of loving God equals loving people in practical ways.

lender.name: The Garling Clan
lender.loan_because: Everyone should.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who help themselves and their communities
lender.occupational_info: I plan meetings, events and conventions for a resort hotel

lender.name: Gerard and Eva
lender.loan_because: We have so much and so many have so little. This is a great way to help people who really need it.
lender.occupational_info: Gerard grows blueberries and Eva delivers babies.

lender.name: Henry Wheatley
lender.loan_because: I believe small businesses are an important path out of extreme poverty and I know small loans can play an essential role in helping small entrepreneurs succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Varied real estate investment plus investment in securities and service on the board of a U.S. public company. I worked in the '60s as a US Peace Corps country director in Africa and South America.

lender.name: Hung
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have a better life than many people, especially in other countries. Just want to do my small part to help others to have a better life, getting out of poverty so their children can go to school. Plus It feels really good.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I hope it help someone live a little better life that comes from a tiny bit of help from me and a large part through their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I support Operations of a distribution center by maintaining the IT infrastructure

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference

lender.name: Point Loma Nazarene
lender.loan_because: Christ calls us to serve "the least of these". We want to use the resources and capabilities that we have to be of the most assistance to the working poor that have the capability of becoming empowered and raising themselves up out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of interested and inspired students!

lender.name: china
lender.loan_because: To help others with their business ventures.
lender.occupational_info: Creating ads and materials for other businesses.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: it expands my world. I find it very gratifying to be able to help in such a tangible and direct way. As soon as my kids are old enough to read I will create accounts for them so they can learn about people across the globe and begin to know what it feels like to give.
lender.occupational_info: I test filters to make sure they are removing bacteria like they are supposed to.

lender.name: Roan
lender.loan_because: because I want people to be able to make a living.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is who is taught at home by my parents.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I am a firm believer that little amounts of sharing could save the world, if only we'd just reach out and do it.
lender.occupational_info: Right now, I have a pretty universal job. I am raising my daughter, helping her to learn and love. She inspires me every day to think about the future, and I try just to keep each day full of wonder for her.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed - and because this is one thing that we can all do to help offset the the unfair distribution of resources in our world... at least a little bit.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies market and grow their business.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Stay at home mum to three.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: We should all care for one another.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and resell antiques

lender.name: matt
lender.occupational_info: design, drafting & project manage construction of houses, apartment & commercial buildings

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: People come to me with ideas and I help them create companies and comply with our country's law. After their company is formed, I help the company get money/financing from other individuals and organizations so they can nurture their ideas and watch them grow.

lender.name: Jan Muhammad
lender.loan_because: i can only loan through my work, through my camera, through my media, if u need
lender.occupational_info: im working as a Producer Current Affairs at Pakistan Television Corporation, a govt. tv channel in pakistan. my work is to digout the realities from the society highlighting the problems of civil society and poor peoples at grassroot level.

lender.name: Kasia
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand from time to time.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I think this is a brilliant concept, one I have often heard about and not found a way to participate in. Who needs interest from a bank when you know how much you can "get back" from investing in such businesses?

lender.name: sunganani
lender.loan_because: I do not loan out money. I try to provide a little something to someone get by *(^_^)* Everything can be done, but we going to have to do it!!
lender.occupational_info: Work hard to see that one day all necessities of life "food, shelter, clothing" are free for all to use.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I want to see other people who have not had the same chances as I, do well for themselves and free themselves from poverty
lender.occupational_info: I work with many different businesses in the UK lending money in a commercial way with an independent financial company

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I want to help people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: ninth Grade Student

lender.name: Nihad
lender.loan_because: I want to start my own company.
lender.occupational_info: I am planing to export europian proudation to my country in Assia.

lender.name: Terez07
lender.loan_because: it just feels good to help others! What I love about Kiva is that is is offering not just a hand out, but a hand "up" to other entrepreneurs throughout the globe.
lender.occupational_info: My business is selling information that people are seeking to solve their problems using the internet as the main channel of distribution.

lender.name: Rick and Aggie
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: being a poor student for so long has shown me how little can go very far.
lender.occupational_info: My work is like trying to fit a square peg through a round hole.

lender.name: Oliver
lender.loan_because: Microfinance makes a real difference!

lender.name: ODonnell
lender.loan_because: We believe you can do more good in the world by helping people help themselves. A sustainable job which supports your family is the cornerstone to a good life. This is a wonderful way to "pay it forward"
lender.occupational_info: Christina sells Kraft Foods Meat and Cheese products to Wal-Mart who then sells these products in their stores across America. David works for Wal-Mart Corporate designing the product layout for store shelves. Mark and Anna attend school.

lender.name: Maelynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: God is gracious

lender.name: Rory Paul
lender.loan_because: I grew up in Africa and know how hard it is to build a business that changes one's life for the better. The lenders represented here have taken the first step to help themselves and they deserve the small assistance we can give them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in heavy industry using thermal camera systems to inspect electrical systems.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Why wouldn't I?
lender.occupational_info: I help build power stations.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because:
I love that I can do something positive to benefit someone.
It seemed like a happy duty to give a small loan when kiva made it so easy to help others out.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work with computers and internet phones and write documents to show others how to use them effectively.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of investing in peoples lives.
lender.occupational_info: I sell windmill energy to homes and apartments.

lender.name: Reese
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: livio
lender.loan_because: I have 2 children, working as webdesigner, joined in a debt with people dangers and I have to get out more ... I have to support my wife and my two children, I am desperate and I do not know more what to do .. I help the people of any continent to save me ...
lender.occupational_info: Development of websites and systems in asp

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Frederick the Terrible
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Into Meaning, Existence and Fishing.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a hand-up not a hand-out. Hard working people deserve the chance to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Work on large commercial business insurance.

lender.name: Crossroad Investments
lender.loan_because: We support the entrepreneurial spirit.

lender.name: Webert
lender.loan_because: I want to make a change on someone life

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: It's fun and it improves people's lives.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I would like to give others the opportunity to grow beyond their current means.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: I sell copier paper to schools and universities in the US.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a small difference and share some of what I have
lender.occupational_info: I ensure that the company I work for is compliant with rules/regulations/laws

lender.name: Charles Michael Paugh
lender.loan_because: I've been helped by others in the course of my career, and I'd like to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I look for unfilled niches in the marketplace, and I find ways to fill them while earning a modest profit.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to help those less fortunate than myself, and also to remind myself that whatever challenges I may face, there are those who face worse challeges everyday, and overcome. Until poverty is eliminated, we can never truly succeed as a global community.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I truly believe kivas are the best way to improve the lives of others. And I can witness how my investment helps others achieve their success.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer who manages the prosecution of child abuse and juvenile delinquency cases. We intervene in the lives of children so they can have successful futures as adults.

lender.name: Ferne
lender.loan_because: it helps others
lender.occupational_info: I help to administer the paying of pensions and survivor benefits to members who work for the federal government and their families.

lender.name: Leonardo
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Jera
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva's mission. Microfinance will not lift everyone out of poverty, but I am sure it has helped many. I want to help improve life opportunities for people throughout the world. I am a blessed individual and if I don't do something, then I would feel like a horrible human being.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying law at Washington University. I hope to work on social equity issues in the USA and women's economic progress issues in North Africa. I want to earn a PhD in Economics, too, and become a professor of law and economics, but I hope to start a a niche legal and consulting firm later on.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance to realize their dreams and ambitions, I feel that seeing a goal accomplished is one of the best feelings a person can have.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Graphic Designer, I usually design things like brochures, presentations, logos, and packaging with a focus on small and new businesses.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team that supports a global order processing system.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it's a cool way to share what I have with people who need a hand.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day and wish i was out in the world making more of a difference.

lender.name: alex
lender.loan_because: I want to give those less fortunate a chance to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Web Designer in Toronto.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: one day, it may be myself in need..

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is good to see people trying to make something of themselves and not simply wanting a handout.
lender.occupational_info:
I work for an international steamship line, importing and exporting shipping containers.
I am also an elected official. President of the Board of Directors of a local fresh water supply district.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: These small loans can be extremely helpful in very poor countries to assist people in getting out of the economic poverty cycle.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a senior citizen apartment complex.

lender.name: Hypopig
lender.loan_because: the loans won't loan themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I....make....the....picture....on....the....computer....

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I believe that small entrepreneurs create good economies and good economies help to overcome poverty and hunger.

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to make a difference in the world and I love supporting entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Margie
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps!
lender.occupational_info: I stay home to take care of my beautiful twin daughters who were born April 2007.

lender.name: Jones Family
lender.loan_because: We would like to make a positive change in someone's life.

lender.name: Indigo Bath & Body
lender.loan_because: I created Indigo from my own love of natural products and things grown in my own garden. By loaning to others who are starting their business, it gives me the opportunity to help someone achieve their own dream.
lender.occupational_info: Indigo is a woman owned business, creating handmade soap and bath products from scratch, using only the best from mother nature. By supporting Indigo Bath & Body, you're supporting a family run business who cares about their products and customers.

lender.name: johnnie
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Make custom silver jewelry.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky in life and feel it is time to give a little back
lender.occupational_info: I spend my company's money

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: It's interesting to see the diverse occupations people have around the world, and exciting to be able to contribute to their successes.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people realize their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: I transfer inventory between warehouses in the U.S. and Canada.

lender.name: Ana Nimos
lender.loan_because: Humanity's Sake

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I love supporting entrepreneurs!
lender.occupational_info: I started a small, online retail handbag company because I hated just being an attorney. It didn't work, now I am starting another business to help the environment.

lender.name: Bryon
lender.occupational_info: I work with small business owners to help them with their accounting needs.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: It gives me a sense of a world community - and I don't need to spend my money on another possession.
lender.occupational_info: I help people help themselves.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Luke 12:48 To whom much is given, much will be expected.

lender.name: Veit
lender.loan_because: Support ideas, share success, turn for a better world

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: God's grace and mercy have been with me. People with big hearts gave to me and my children when we needed a home and food. Now that we have everything we need, it's my turn to extend a loving hand.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: it is the compassionate thing to do and we can all use help now and again.
lender.occupational_info: I am a newly-graduated librarian hoping to work with underserved people in the United States' Southwest.

lender.name: Hansai
lender.occupational_info: IT consultant by day, massage therapist on weekends.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: it is an excellent opportunity to help those less fortunate than myself in developing parts of the world with little risk. While there are other sites which wil make a return, the point of this isn't as an investment to make profit, but an investment to facilitate change.
lender.occupational_info: I sing.

lender.name: Erik & Saskia
lender.loan_because: To speak with Audrey Hepburn: "I'm filled with a rage at ourselves. I don't believe in collective guilt, but I do believe in collective responsibility."

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I do not have very much, but I guess it is a king's ransom is the greater scheme of things. Every day I feel helpless to "do more", and Kiva allows me to help and see tangible results without having a lot to give.
lender.occupational_info: working with computers

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I love being able to positively affect other people.

lender.name: Halli
lender.occupational_info: I study Lyme disease

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Great way to help some people.
lender.occupational_info: Finance

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me, so I must share my blessing with those that need help.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I love that I can impact individuals directly who do not have access to traditional funding sources. The fact that this is a "hand up, not a hand out," "teach a man to fish" type of program is really exciting - when my money comes back it can be used as capital again to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am a corporate attorney working at a large law firm. Most of my work consists of helping business owners here in the U.S. raise money through investors, usually hundreds of thousands or millions of dollars. Microlending allows me to do the same for people who are not wealthy individuals or successful business owners.

lender.name: Khadijah
lender.loan_because: We must become the change we want to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the communications field.

lender.name: Tiffany and Ben
lender.loan_because: We would like to make a difference, however small, in the hopes that we can make someone else's life a little better and a little brighter. We believe in generosity and kindness, and feel that there is too little of it in the world today. Gandhi said it best: "be the change you want to see in the world."

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: I get a sense of knowing exactly what my money is going to in order to help somebody else and gives a small feeling of doing something good in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large telecommunications company working on their servers (large computers). I fix problems and implement new solutions.

lender.name: Hogggatt Family
lender.loan_because: People are capable of great things when given the opportunity
lender.occupational_info: We work with individuals with disability and in the foster care system in order to provide the resources and supports needed to be successful

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I am a very fortunate person. I was loaned money so that I may become a lawyer. I am currently repaying my debts but have a little extra to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I feel that I wouldn't be doing my education justice if I didn't help others.

lender.name: joshua
lender.loan_because: I believe this concept will help shape the opportunity of the poor into being more creative and not just settling for droppings off a table.
lender.occupational_info: I am an investor. I like to invest in people and community's of the poor, local and abroad. With my return coming from a much greater source.

lender.name: Autumn
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good! My life is so blessed and I wish to pass my blessings onward.

lender.name: vulcanjedi
lender.loan_because: I am not sure but it seems to be the right thing to do and I believe what goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in IT for 25 years. Computers are my hobby and webpages and video games are for fun.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I can't afford to give a lot, but on my journey through life and work a lot of people gave me a small helping hand that made a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find new jobs.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: I believe in the good in people. If I give to someone to make their life better I know mine will be better. I wish I could give more to help more but I do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I audit for a small company in Tennessee.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to assist people with improving the life of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: International Freight Services

lender.name: Gosia
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs help
lender.occupational_info: I take care of all the technology at a school.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Curiosity driven.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: Just want to help people.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: spite
lender.occupational_info: I use words to change people's lives.

lender.name: ian
lender.loan_because: "The time has come, To talk of many things: Of shoes‚Äîand ships‚Äîand sealing-wax‚Äî Of cabbages‚Äîand kings‚Äî And why the sea is boiling hot‚Äî And whether pigs have wings."
lender.occupational_info: The world is full of magic. Ancient, deep seated magic.

lender.name: Raminder
lender.loan_because: I couldn't save the world as I had intended so maybe I can lend a small hand :-)
lender.occupational_info: Selling technology hardware/software to everyone...

lender.name: Mercedes
lender.loan_because: I believe that if people have a dream and a will to do better in life that they can. Sometimes we need people to help us not everyhting is under our control. I am helping Peruvians right now because I was born in Piura, Peru and many people helped me to be who I am now.
lender.occupational_info: I worked as a systems engineer. I do simulations to design, verify and validate radar systems.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: It order to keep what I have, I must give it away. Besides, I want to do something for somebody else for a change. When I really needed help someone was kind enough to help me, no questions asked. I will forever be grateful for that. One person can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a local TV station. I provide all aspects of computer support.

lender.name: Ericka
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference by giving hope.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: Although I'm not rich, I know that there is always something to be done to help others. Through volunteer work and donations to charities I strive to make the world a better place. I know that my money helps someone through a tough time and that it continues to help them get a leg up in a difficult economy. I'm proud to be able to help those struggling by providing them the assistance they need to become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a small restaurant while I work nights to finish my PhD in German.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the resources with which I have been blessed and I want to make a tangible difference in the lives of women across the world. I also want to set an example to my children and others that one person CAN make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother working hard to raise my children to be wise, responsible, caring world citizens.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: There are those that need more than I do. Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I provide technology solutions.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Hopefully I can help somebody get ahead in their life. It's the right thing to do and it will only help to make our planet a better place to live.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: In nothing do men approach so nearly to the gods as in doing good to men. ~ Cicero

lender.name: Diederik
lender.loan_because: Micro-financing is the only way the middle class in the developed world can help creation of a middle class of entrepreneurs in the developing world
lender.occupational_info: Make the brains of computers

lender.name: McLain
lender.loan_because: I want my sons to have a clearer picture of the world and our responsibility to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a large internet site for a government agency.

lender.name: MICHELE
lender.loan_because: Best way to spend my money, is by helping others - $25.00 loans will not break my bank, but can significantly help another person

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I enjoy being successful at what i do and love helping others get there too.
lender.occupational_info: At work i create drawings and maps that help with the construction of water related projects. I also volunteer at a local animal shelter and with a women's organization.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I have met a lot of good people who just need a little bit of help to start them on a journey of producivity and success.
lender.occupational_info: I have to discover ways to raise money for a university.

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: As I have been helped in the past so do I want to help others.

lender.name: Hayward UMC
lender.loan_because: We want to be good neighbors
lender.occupational_info: We are a church committed to loving God and loving our neighbors (near and far).

lender.name: Prashant
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to make a difference in someones life.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: It's fun!

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help.
lender.occupational_info: I sell print services to companies in eastern North America

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I can. It's addictive!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a teacher and a craftsperson.

lender.name: Lexy
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a little help! This is a great program & I'm very honored to be apart of it.

lender.name: Ion Channel Media Group
lender.loan_because: it is a much, much better use of our money than having it sit in a bank account earning paltry interest.
lender.occupational_info: We connect buyers of scientific products with businesses and also provide free information to scientists through our databases.

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: Helping people that need help is the greatest thing a person can do. If we would all take the time to help someone, the world would be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mechanic in the US Air Force. I serve my country and try to help out anyone that requires assistance.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of encouraging women's businesses and independence. This is something I can do very easily that has a direct impact on someone's life.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: such a small amount of money for me can make such a huge difference for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. federal government.

lender.name: Cody
lender.loan_because: It is my chance to help folks out.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I can afford it right now.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I believe that blessED people bless people.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise auto-manufacturing employees to verify that the products they build meet quality standards for the corporation.

lender.name: Steve
lender.occupational_info: I teach 9th American History.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help other people who aren't as fortunate as me.
lender.occupational_info: currently learning to become a chemistry teacher

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for all I have and want to help others

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: I believe that it is my duty to help others accomplish their dreams and goals, just as others have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I dream of a world where everyone is granted the opportunity to better themselves and their communities without the worry of too limited resources.

lender.name: Robin & Ray
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who struggle to make ends meet in this world
lender.occupational_info: work on a computer pulling data for reports and Office manager

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: It`s the right thing to do.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't be where I am without help.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I have traveled the world and met the most interesting people in some of the smallest countries. I enjoy being able to help others in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly work in non-commercial television, educational and history subjects.

lender.name: Adjabeng
lender.loan_because: I know what helping others can do to improve lives. I grew up in Ghana. I love to give.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct new drug discovery research.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to return the same kind of generosity and trust that's been given to me.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: its a good way to give back!

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: as an entrepreneur I have better control over my destiny and I hope that this small amount of money will be of a big benefit to fellow entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I manage real estate properties and have my own business.

lender.name: Kiameshia
lender.loan_because: I want to bless others
lender.occupational_info: I am an image consultant, personal shopper and wardrobe stylist. I teach dressing for success workshops and self sufficiency to woman!

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I can and it's a good thing to help others get their business together.
lender.occupational_info: I make records with independent musicians and run a recording studio.

lender.name: Mike & Christina
lender.loan_because: We want to share the love of Jesus by giving back what God has blessed us with.

lender.name: Bert
lender.loan_because: Money should not be a limiting factor
lender.occupational_info: Vice President for Finance in a small company

lender.name: Tisha & Family
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples lives. I feel so blessed with all that I have. It's so important to give back & bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I have the greatest job in the world ! Taking care of my 10 year old twins & instilling in them to be the best they can be! & most of all to find your true purpose in LIFE !!!

lender.name: Jolene
lender.loan_because: I care and love everyone!
lender.occupational_info: I produce and host my own cooking show on the internet. I am a comedian and try to bring laughter and love to the world!

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: It is important to give back for all that you have been given.

lender.name: Dinarda
lender.loan_because: I grew up in a very poor country and I experienced first hand what a big difference a loan makes for these people. What might be just a little bit of money for us, in a third world country it means hope and opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the technology department of a multinational bank. Mostly I write functional specifications documents for the proprietary applications that my department builds.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in life to have a wonderful family and a successful career. I believe very strongly that every single human being on this planet deserves the same opportunities that I have had.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I received loans to pay for college. This gave me the opportunity to better my circumstances. I want to pass that opportunity onto someone else...
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales representative for a major IT Corporation.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I'm fascinated by this ability Kiva gives us to connect to people. I don‚Äôt have much but at least once a month I try to find another $25 to put into the Kiva kitty. .

lender.name: Jodie
lender.loan_because: He has showed you, O man, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God. Michah 6:8
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that groups that teach professional education courses meet specific regulations.

lender.name: Michal
lender.loan_because: I want to make an investment in the betterment of the world and I am fascinated by seeing what others do around the globe and excited to see them succeed!
lender.occupational_info: I help with scientific research into TB, Cystic Fibrosis, AIDS, and such. I'm also active with the Green Party in my state and community and believe microcredit/lending to be an embodiment of several of our 10 Key Values, particularly Community-based Economics, Global Responsibility and Sustainability

lender.name: Kika
lender.loan_because: I loan for the sheer satisfaction of helping others‚Ä¶
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer. I try my best to make magazines, books, packaging, etc look as appealing as possible to the public :)

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I repair computers that people are having problems with.

lender.name: Dwayne
lender.loan_because: I can....
lender.occupational_info: I design equipment to make pharmaceuticals (medicine).

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: I believe one person's contribution can make a difference. When friends join together great things can be accomplished!

lender.name: Angali
lender.loan_because:
My husband was a US Army Major and was killed in action over a year ('07) ago in Afghanistan. He was always thinking of ways to help the people of Afghanistan rebuild their lives and country. I am so proud of him.
I do this in honor of Hank Ofeciar (my husband) to help budding business people and entrepreneurs improve their lives, family and community. Hank believed in helping people who helped themselves....hardworking people like these entrepreneurs...they deserve all the support and help we can give them. Something so small creates such a big impact for someone half way around the world.

lender.name: Chuck & Joe
lender.occupational_info: We both work in the nonprofit sector in the US. Joe helps hard to employee individuals get the training needed to secure employment and Chuck works with US based foundations and other grantmaking programs.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: As Christians, my husband and I believe in social justice and in having a global impact. Loaning money to those who want to improve their lot in life is a small way we can invest in the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a software product that makes it easier to get information on cellular phones.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I feel my vocation in life is to help people who are less fortunate than I am. It gives me great joy in helping people who really want to make something of their lives. There is something so powerful in giving. I will continue to be a Kiva lender for as long as I live.
lender.occupational_info: I believe in helping people who genuinely want to work and support themselves without expecting handouts

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I care about helping others succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the aerospace industry.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I can. It is also an opportunity for me to support others with engaging their opportunities for growth and/or development.
lender.occupational_info: I predominantly work with commercial organizations to establish and maintain information security practices that are used to protect electronic data environments.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping women help themselves.

lender.name: Caitlin
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to have been given the help and opportunities I have needed in life. I want to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: it just doesn't make any sense to not loan.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Oogi 1999-2010
lender.loan_because: Helping others is what life is about. Because of the current climate and weather changes and their impact on food production, I support those who farm and raise animals.
lender.occupational_info: I programmed computers.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I would like to pay it forward!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference to people whose only obstacle is money - a tiny amount at that.
lender.occupational_info: Creating and maintaining web sites about a variety of topics, including travel, business, and retail.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.occupational_info: I share education with doctors around the world so they can better treat patients with cancer.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: Supporting others in achieving their intentions and goals to become successful entrepreneurs creates joy, abundance, and freedom!

lender.name: Justine "the" Chick
lender.loan_because: Investments in people and small businesses create a greater benefit to society than mere charity.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: im down with jesus

lender.name: Avi
lender.loan_because: I know there are people out in the world far worse off than I am, and sitting here at home, I didn't think I could do anything to help them. Now that I found this, I can spend my money on something that matters, instead of on something that will rot my teeth or my brain.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 13 year old student who is interested in helping other people who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I feel I should share my good fortune.

lender.name: Tyson
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer who works in mining.

lender.name: mmm
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Johannes
lender.loan_because: I believe it's probably the best way to stimulate people - Loaning is better than giving, because it gives you a drive to pay it back. It's also nice to help people :)
lender.occupational_info: Working with computers, design, visual art and music.

lender.name: Kirk
lender.loan_because: Feels good.
lender.occupational_info: Design & develop software.

lender.name: Jason & Cathy
lender.loan_because: It's nice to help someone who is willing to work hard and make their business grow and help their local economy.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are in sales. I sell construction supplies and my wife sells instrumentation that laboratories use to analize different materials.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I am alot better off than most and I wish to give them a opportunity to make there lives better.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: T&t
lender.loan_because: I want my daughter to learn about helping other people as well as to learn about other countries and lifestyles. It's a great way to teach her about humanitarianism as well as a little bit of geography and sociology.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adult students at a rural, community college how to effectively help people in need through social support, information & resources, and community development.

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a church office ministering to the ministers. I am support staff.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Everybody should get their chance. "God does not need to receive, but people need to give." Rich Dad
lender.occupational_info: Ph.D. student of econometrics, curious about world economics, enjoying time in Italy. Studying history to predict future :)

lender.name: KHB
lender.loan_because: it's fun to know i can help out someone all the way across the globe. :) the dollar is still strong! hehe.
lender.occupational_info: "Balls" said the Queen. "If I had to I'd be King." -- ah, for the lack of 2.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because:
I have so much - God has blessed me greatly with my dear husband, a good job and good health. With these blessings comes responsibility -- love because I am loved, give because so much has been given to me, help because others have helped me.
One day, when I was a teenager, I came to realize that I owed a great debt, one I could not pay. Because he loved me so much, Jesus paid my sin debt and made it possible for me to be in right standing before God. Anything I can do now to help others and please Him is my way of saying "Thank you".
Read what Jesus said about himself in the Bible, in the book of John, chapter 14, verse 6.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office at a computer and go to meetings much of my day. i talk to lots of people and make decisions about what work my people should do.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: Capitalism works.
lender.occupational_info: Electronics Test Systems.

lender.name: Dennis and Suzanne
lender.loan_because: We enjoy it.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people find ways to solve their problems.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Kent
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Bev & Bill& Lisa
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to make a difference in someone's life!

lender.name: Shaylon
lender.loan_because: I think that reading about other people and the way they live can be a learning experience and I'm glad that I'm able to help in any way possible! <333
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in 7th grade and i think that being a part of this program is a great opportunity and seeing people get through hard times in life is really rewarding ;D

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: If people would want to help each other, the world would be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Combat Medic in the Army and help sick and injured soldiers, provide emergency treatment for traumatic injuries and teach classes on first aid and combat lifesaving techniques.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us, and we have a powerful, social responsibility to help our brothers and sisters throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take pictures of flowers and natural landscapes and sell my photographs on cards and also framed and matted.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am a buisiness owner and know that sometimes just a little help will get you to that next level

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank, writing computer software that keeps track of it's trades

lender.name: Joseph
lender.occupational_info: I design computer systems for a finance company.

lender.name: Maria and Brian
lender.loan_because: We want to help people make a sustainable living for themselves. By lending we hope to create a sense of self-worth and productivity within their communities.
lender.occupational_info: We help island visitors have fun while on vacation!

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: By helping people in this part of the world I hope it is a small way to support our troops in this area.

lender.name: Kurt
lender.loan_because: After working in the Peace Corps and using micro-loans I know the power of them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the entertainment business doing business development.

lender.name: Sharyn
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with much.

lender.name: kevin
lender.loan_because: I've had nothing and have known the fear of not knowing how I was going to keep a roof over my head. But for the grace of God.....
lender.occupational_info: I am a project manager in the construction industry.

lender.name: Geneva
lender.loan_because: as Alice Walker writes "each one must help one up" and I like to help someone to a better life as mine has been blessed by God

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to give back what has been given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand how to manage their finances in a way that improves their quality of life.

lender.name: Book Club of Fairfax
lender.loan_because: We are a group of friends who heard about microloans and wanted to share a little bit of what we have
lender.occupational_info: We are a book club that has not had a great track record of finishing books so we thought we'd try making microloans so we would still have a reason to get together

lender.name: Doug and Julia
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together. We feel it is important to help people become independent and prosperous.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I see a lot of things that can get done with a little bit of cash and a handshake deal-- kiva represents a way to help people and take them on their word.
lender.occupational_info: I write software that makes banks function.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: hope, trust and opportunity matters.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer, designer and curious explorer of knowledge...and good eats from around the world.

lender.name: Janelle
lender.loan_because: of the crushing guilt... jk

lender.name: Jane & Emma
lender.loan_because: I want to set a good example to my children and it's a great learning experience for my daughter.
lender.occupational_info: I have 7 children and work part time in the antiques and collectibles field.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I can. There's enough to go around if we'd all do just a little. Kiva makes it pretty easy. The ROI is good for the borrower, and great for my heart.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to share what I have been blessed with.
lender.occupational_info: I get to study trees and plants outdoors, and in the lab, to understand more about an area's natural history, and perhaps a bit about its future.

lender.name: Michele & David
lender.loan_because: We want to help empower women around the world to support themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: We help companies and individuals resolve their business disputes.

lender.name: Vin
lender.loan_because: I want the best for my children like so many stories here. This is why I was compelled to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help maintain servers that allow people to communicate via email.

lender.name: Sonja
lender.loan_because: We all need to support each other more.. whether it's financial or motivational, every little bit helps.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I live in the United States. By US standards I am poor. I drive a 25 year old car. But by the world's standards I am rich. As a man of wealth I need to use this wealth to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of a developmentally delayed man.

lender.name: bfb
lender.loan_because: I can and we all should
lender.occupational_info: My job is to write software that helps banks run their web sites for commercial customers

lender.name: A New York Possum
lender.loan_because: This loan is to honor the love I have for my precious daughter, Samantha. I also wish to congratulate her on her recent graduation. I am so very proud of her and grateful that I want to embrace and help the entire world.
lender.occupational_info: work? what's that? I'm a freakin possum

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Life is short. You can't take it with you, so give a helping hand today. Lead by example and make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We build custom single family homes in the DFW metroplex (Texas).

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: I want to share the love of Jesus Christ and what he has done for me by saving me and giving me eternal life and the hope he extends to all those who confess their sins to Him, repent and trust in Him for the forgiveness of their sins. He has paid the price for all of us, we just need to humble ourselves and accept His gift of forgiveness. God Bless

lender.name: Janet Quebec, Canada
lender.occupation: Turning the hearts of the children to their Father
lender.loan_because: My friend Cat gave me a gift certificate! Thanks Cat! Jesus cares for humanity. We should follow His example!
lender.occupational_info: I connect people with their Heavenly Father who is always calling them to come back home to Him.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It is absolutely the right thing to do and it makes me feel warm and fuzzy inside.
lender.occupational_info: I do volunteer work with human and animal welfare groups, veterans groups and anywhere I can make the planet better.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone who has the means to help others should do so.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I grew up poor and I know what a difference such a small amount can make.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: it's the least I can do. Many people can use the few dollars that I can donate, and that deed comes around when the money's returned and and be lend to others.
lender.occupational_info: medicine and public health

lender.name: Bree
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the ability to provide for their families, a job that pays a living wage, and the satisfaction of making a difference in the world through their work.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and market new food products.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I have had a tremendous number of opportunities in my life, and I'd like to make sure that others some, too.
lender.occupational_info: I work in publishing.

lender.name: Peggy
lender.loan_because: Spending $25 on a pizza is easy, giving $25 to a person in need should be easier! Who says they don't have the money?
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and watch my son and my brother's two children.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I feel good when I do things for people. The most humbling moment in my life was when I had to ask a church for money to eat and get baby milk - some 48 years ago. I never forgot how it made me feel when someone did something for me when I needed it most. By giving you receive. Like others have said - I loan because I can.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people empower themselves, meet their goals and achieve financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: I work with middle school students at a diverse public school in Arlington, VA.

lender.name: Decker
lender.loan_because: Preschooler, learning to help others

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make better lives for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and repair machinery for an industrial quartz glass company. I also do some inspection and shipping.

lender.name: Anny
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in school to become an eye doctor. :)

lender.name: Tricia
lender.loan_because: we all have a vision for our lives. I was blessed to have all the opportunities to reach my true potential, though I recognize most in this world are not even given a choice. I have great faith that we can change the world one person at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am finishing my law degree in May and will be an attorney in October. I'll do my best to uphold the rule of law, and use my talents to help others whenever I can.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It is joyful to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I help people heal.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it seemed like a neat thing to do. My neighbors here in the USA are from Ghana. Rose and Kwasi are wonderful people and I picked a person from Ghana.
lender.occupational_info: I help the government provide benefits to people in need.

lender.name: ManMohan
lender.loan_because: Feed a person for one day and sure the person is happy for the day or until he feels hungry. Provide a means to sustain for life time and the person is never hungry for life. This is what KIVA stands for and what I honestly believe in
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan for their future.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I believe anyone who believes in themselves and has a good work ethic should be afforded the opportunity to better themselves. I wish each and every one good luck in their endeavors and good health. Best wishes from the USA.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Telecommunications Industry as a Contractor for a Major Telephone Company. My job entails monitoring alarms in Company sites all over the US. I work from the Power Control Center or Network Operations Center. I previously installed the very same equipment (DC Power Plants) that I am now monitoring and have reached Retirement age. Just waiting on the right time, or the urge to finally retire.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: You deserve to be helped as I have been in the past. Pass the favor forward when you can.
lender.occupational_info: I make machinery work, I write the computer programs that tell machines what to do

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to give after traveling to many countries and seeing the level of poverty.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Someone gave me a loan once when I really needed it ...
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit that helps other nonprofits make the world a better place

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great opportunity to help someone help themselves with a small loan. Great things come in little packages. Let's make some great things happen.
lender.occupational_info: I design databases for a company that sells farm (and other) machinery around the world.

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: a bit of money from me helps someone else achieve their goals. I find it inspiring and wonderful that people without a lot of money are willing to work so hard to provide for their families.

lender.name: Fumi
lender.loan_because: I want people to be what they want to become, do what they want to in their life, and become happy.
lender.occupational_info: I am a traveler

lender.name: Scott Olszowiec
lender.loan_because: I support anyone who is strives to make their own future through entrepreneurship and hardwork.
lender.occupational_info: I tell my kids I colour for a living.

lender.name: pepe
lender.occupational_info: working with little kids is the most amazing and refreshing experience

lender.name: Nanc
lender.loan_because:
There are good people trying to make an honest living for themselves, their family and their community. They have the passion, drive and commitment - now all they need is a little seed money.
I loan because I can. (And for as little as $25 - you can too!)
My seed money is a true circle of life - once a loan is repaid, I can re-lend and continue to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Store Manager of a kitchen supply store. I sell dishes, cookware, tools, appliances and textiles.

lender.name: Water City
lender.loan_because: this is a chance to add movement (action) to the things we say are most important.
lender.occupational_info: retelling the story of Jesus

lender.name: William Csanyi
lender.loan_because: Humanity... If I can help people have a better life and succeed, and I am able to donate.....why wouldn't I?
lender.occupational_info: Geology is Earth Science. It is the study of the Earth's history, processes, and ultimately an understanding of the world we occupy.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I know that a little help can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English language and literature for my university.

lender.name: Mohammad
lender.loan_because: one day I have to answer to a Higher Authority that how did i helped other human beings when i had the ability to do so.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: collective interest is self-interest...

lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with more than most people have and it makes me happy to share what God has given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy all creative activities and I try to be a reflection of God's love to all I meet.

lender.name: Lydia
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed by God and want to bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be an ESL teacher

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: We can all make a difference.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: microloans eliminate poverty from it's roots.
lender.occupational_info: I'm learning about how to make the world a better place

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children about science and history.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I can. Because the work being done is good work..
lender.occupational_info: I work to help people clarify their understanding of themselves. This tends to lead to more energized compassionate people. Myself included.

lender.name: Seth
lender.loan_because: I do not want money to hold anyone back.
lender.occupational_info: I implement investment strategies for clients in order to meet their retirement and education needs.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Last Christmas my employer gave us a monetary gift and introduced us all to Kiva, suggesting we "pay it forward" and invest. What a great idea!

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I have extra at times and I want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: I solve computer problems at a large medical care provider

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference, as I have received so many blessings in my career.
lender.occupational_info: I worked my way up, from the time I left school, working with computers. I have worked for companies that provide connections to the Internet, as well as managing computers that allow websites like this to exist. I am married to a wonderful man, and we have three house cats.

lender.name: Joeymom
lender.loan_because: In gratitude for blessings, bestowed and to come.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of two gorgeous boys, and the wife of a wonderful husband. I also teach art history.

lender.name: Jen & Jay
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to be able to help others.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate in life and I feel I should give back to others.
lender.occupational_info: In my occupation, I provide unsecured credit to contractors for multi-million dollar construction projects ranging from highways to skyscrapers.

lender.name: Kenny
lender.loan_because: I like to help the less fortunate and I hope that my donation can help them strive to success.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sophomore in college who is trying to be successful in life. I always have homework and I always gotta study. I try to do my best in school and if I am wealthy, it would be my pleasure to continue on to help the less fortunate.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I believe in rewarding and encouraging hard work and good ideas.
lender.occupational_info: I teach psychology - the study of how people think and understand the world around them. I love being a teacher, and enjoy working with students.

lender.name: Mansyzygy
lender.loan_because: I am a citizen of the World

lender.name: Akshay
lender.loan_because: I believe that if you help others , the same will return to you when you are in need.
